entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as turning back for a last look at the house.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's friend and companion in the car, who shrieks that she left her diary.

entities.name: molly weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley's wife, mentioned as being addressed by Arthur.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: The father of the Weasley children and husband of Molly Weasley.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: One of the Weasley twins, who forgot his box of Filibuster fireworks.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Another one of the Weasley twins, who ran in for his broomstick.

relationships.description: Harry turned back for a last look at the house.
George forgot his box of Filibuster fireworks.
Fred ran in for his broomstick.
Ginny shrieked that she left her diary.
